sentence.Network_en: It burns as a will - o'- the - wisp , dancing onward to fairylands of delight.
sentence.Network_cn: 它会像磷火那样发出捉摸不定的光芒, 跳跃着飞向欢乐的仙境.

sentence.Network_en: You shouldn't hope to find perfect happiness it's just a will - o'the - wisp.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要指望能找到十全十美的幸福 -- 那只不过是镜花水月.

sentence.Network_en: Two Will O'the Wisp are summoned to help their summoner in battle.
sentence.Network_cn: 在战斗中,两个鬼火将被召唤来帮助它们的召唤者.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: originally as Will with the wisp, the sense of wisp being 'handful of (lighted) hay'

means.word_mean: 1. a pale light sometimes seen at night over marshy ground
